column5: I found it in the states last weekend. Pretty tasty!
awesome !!!
This is the greatest thing ever.
Bahaha  What is the difference between normal bacon and bacon jerky? More salt?  I wonder what it would taste like deep-fried?
Deep fried bacon jerky? or deep fried bacon?
How about bacon-wrapped deep-fried bacon jerky?  You know that's going straight to your aorta...
Can it be filled with butter and then lightly floured before deep frying?
Picked up a bag of that at Walmart Pet dept on saturday.My girls love the stuff.
So it's dog food?
My brother used to eat milkbones when we were kids.
lol... nope
Pretty sure . They have Duck wrapped too.
Say it isn't so!!!!!!!!
Man, I would pay for that big time...time to order me some jerky
We have all kinds of things down here we try to keep from you Canadian's.....LOL....
Mmmmmmm duck wrapped bacon. Just think if it was the maple kind too.
FYP...YW
Individually wrapped too!!!
That's why heart doctors in the states drive ferrarri's........

I actually made some of my own on the weekend.. Put a pound of bacon on the smoker while smoking a rabbit. I actualy used it to wrap the rabbit so it wouldnt dry out while smoking..The bacon was amazing! Was just like jerky
Sundays dinner,has been decided. Thanks
